title: Questions regarding PESSAT
content:
I'll be writing PESSAT for B.Tech as well as B.Sc (Psychology), so are there chances that the timings for the two could clash?

And is B.Sc (Psychology) good in PESU?

comments.body: You get to choose the date for the Btech exam. Not so sure about the bsc part though
Did you get in for B.Sc psychology?
